attributes.action: REMOVE CAR TAX AND REPLACE WITH FUEL DUTY BALANCE INCREASE
attributes.additional_details:
FOR YEARS WE HAVE BEEN ASKING FOR THE REMOVAL OF THE CAR TAX SYSTEM.
THIS PROVIDES THAT POSSIBILITY, REMOVE CAR TAX ,CALCULATE HOW MUCH IS COLLECTED ANUALLY FROM THIS TAX, THEN CALCULATE THE NUMBER OF GALLONS/LITRES OF FUEL SOLD AND DEVIDE THE TWO, THIS WILL GIVE A SMALL AMOUNT TO INCREASE THE FUEL BY, DOING THIS IT WILL CREATE A FAR FAIRER SYSTEM, IT WILL ALSO REMOVE THE NEED FOR POLICE TIME IN CHASING DOWN UNTAXED VEHICLES.
IF YOU THEN REPLACE THE MOT SYSTEM WITH A RECEIPT ON COMPLETION OF THE TEST WHICH IS TAKEN TO THE POST OFFICE WHO WILL REQUIRE AN INSURANCE DOCUMENT PROVING THE INSURANCE AND THE RECEIPT FROM THE MOT TESTING STATION, THEY WOULD THEN ISSUE A DISC DISPLAYING THE MOT DATES AND NAME,DATE OF THE INSURANCE, THIS WOULD MAKE BOTH THE CAR TAX AND FUEL PRICING AND THE MOT AND INSURANCE PROBLEMS EASIER FOR ALL, MOST IMPORTANT THE GOVERMENT WOULD BE GARENTEED A LARGER REVENUE RETURN AS EVERY USER OF FUEL WILL ALSO PAY THERE FAIR SHARE OF DUTY FOR ROAD USE.
.
